history.proof: intros. unfold Rdiv. sfirstorder use: RtoC_mult, RtoC_inv unfold: Cdiv.

exceptions.exn: The LHS of Rdiv_plus (_ / _ + _ / _)%R does not match any subterm of the goal
In environment x, y : R H : y <> 0 Unable to unify "x / y" with "RtoC (x * / y)".
In environment x, y : R H : y <> 0 Unable to unify "y <> 0" with "(x * / y)%R = x / y".
In environment x, y : R H : y <> 0 Unable to unify "y <> 0" with "(x * / y)%R = x / y".

original: intros. intros H. unfold Rdiv. rewrite Rdiv_plus. - reflexivity. - apply H. - apply H.
